name: Theseus
body:
### Welcome to Theseus.
Theseus VR opens a whole new world of mobile computing capabilities. Environment too bright or too cramped for a laptop? Wish you had a multi-monitor station on the road? Not a problem! Using just a $4 Google Cardboard and the phone you already have, you can now work in places and ways that were previously unimaginable! Check out Theseus here: TODO: add deployed link.
